#sidebar SyntaxSidebar
= `varPrint` =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [varPrintSyntax varPrint] > [varPrintMethod varPrint]
=== Parameters ===
 * *$varName* _String_
  Variable avaible in scope of type Array or Object.  $varName should NOT start with $.


=== Description ===
Prints variable $varName as matched elements' content.
